system.description: You can obtain a familiar that is more powerful than normal.
system.benefit:
When choosing a familiar, the creatures listed below are also available. You can choose a familiar with an alignment up to one step away on each alignment axis (lawful-chaotic, good-evil).

See the SRD or core rules for the list of improved familiars (e.g. imp, pseudodragon, quasit) and their special abilities.
system.special: Improved familiars have different spell resistance, special abilities, and other traits than normal familiars. See the Monster Manual for details.
